Class Bubbler

All Implemented Interfaces:
IDisplayObject
public class Bubbler
extends DisplayObject

Bubbler contains all the behaviour and state to represent a Bubbler.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Kristopher Randle

Constructor Detail

Bubbler

public Bubbler(double x,
               double y,
               double scale)
Constructor for objects of class Bubbler, initialised to the position at xpos,ypos,zpos

Parameters:
xpos - The starting x position of the fish in the aquarium.
ypos - The starting y position of the fish in the aquarium.
scale - The scale (size) of the fish.

METHOD: set the orientation of the bubbler in the aquarium - Method from Marc Price.

y - orientation about the y axis

setPosition

protected void setPosition(double x,
                           double y)
METHOD: set the position of the bubbler in the aquarium - Method from Marc Price. This method is used to specify the exact starting location of the bubbler.

Parameters:
x - the rqd position along the x axis
y - the rqd position along the y axis
